scheduled_maintenances.name: [SBG5][INFRASTRUCTURE] - High and low voltage emergency power generator testing

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 15/11/2022 07:00UTC End time : 16/11/2022 16:00UTC Service impact : None Service improvement :As part of our test campaign for our electrical works, we are going to put the SBG5 emergency TGBT (High and low voltage emergency power generator) into service and test its operation, switching all the TGBTs one after the other on it, then testing the prioritization of the switches while trying to switch a second TGBT on the Secours5..
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 14/11/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 17/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some background work related to the cooling systems

Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
